snippet: The mining company expects demand from China to pick up over the medium term, countering the current drop in the ore’s price.
lead_paragraph: The mining company expects demand from China to pick up over the medium term, countering the current drop in the ore’s price.

headline.main: BHP Billiton Outlines Plan to Cut Costs on Iron Ore
headline.print_headline: BHP Outlines Plan to Cut Costs and Expand
